page.title: 15FASHION
page.content: At school we have to wear a uniform.{The girls}wear a grey skirt light blue blouse grey jumper with white socks and brown/black or grey shoes. Occasionally we have{Mufti {days(non uniform)}when we pay 25p each the money going to{Save the Children {Fund.}The fasionable design at the moment is the floral design. Colours are light but not bright and to hold up our hair we use butterfly clips. They come in many different colours.{The boys}wear black or grey trousers a blue shirt a tie in the Winter a grey jumper grey socks and black/grey/brown shoes. Outside school the in-thing is to wear breakdance clothes the main makers being Nike Puma and Hi-Tec. Girls fashion shoes are canvas jelly shoes (plastic) and Jesus boots. Leather strappy holey ones and of course stiletto shoes.
